title: "Lightfoot appoints a new chief engagement officer in a Fifth Floor shuffle"
excerpt: "Mayor Lori Lightfoot appointed Nubia Willman, the director of the city’s Office of New Americans, as the city’s new chief engagement officer, a position vacated this month by Martina Hone who left the administration to launch a bid for alderman of the 5th ward."
